text: "Running to Stand Still" is a 1987 song by Irish rock group U2. It is the fifth track from their fifth studio album The Joshua Tree and is a slow ballad and deals with herion-addicted couple living in Dublin. == References == Category:1987 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Folk ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Folk rock songs Category:Acoustic blues songs Category:U2 songs
title: Running to Stand Still
